articles.author: Nagraj Gollapudi
articles.title: ICC shifts Men's Under 19 World Cup from Sri Lanka to South Africa - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The move is a direct consequence of SLC's recent suspension by the global cricket body
articles.content: Group A: India, Bangladesh, Ireland, USA.Group B: England, SA, WI, Scotland.Group C: Australia, SL, Zimbabwe, Namibia.Group D: Afghanistan, Pakistan, NZ, Nepal.
